summary: A set of neural modules that prepare and transform video data for multimodal speech‑visual systems. They include front‑ends that convert raw frames into compact embeddings using either a simple linear projection or a configurable ResNet backbone, utilities for normalizing, resizing, and permuting video tensors, and augmentation tools that apply spatial and temporal masking to simulate realistic variations.
business_intent: Enable robust lip‑reading and speech‑visual models by providing ready‑to‑use video preprocessing, feature extraction, and augmentation components that can be integrated into end‑to‑end training pipelines.
